content: संन्यस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To place or put down, deposit. {@--2@} To lay down or aside, give up, abandon, quit; तेन त्वया शस्त्रं न संन्यस्तव्यं <ls>V. 5</ls>; संन्यस्तशस्त्र <ls>R. 2. 59</ls>; संन्यस्ताभरणं गात्रं <ls>Me. 93</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 67.</ls> {@--3@} To make or deliver over, entrust, commit to the care of; <ls>Bg. 3. 30.</ls> {@--4@} To put together. {@--5@} (Used intransitively) To resign the world, discard all worldly ties and attachments and become an anchorite, संदृश्य क्षणभंगुरं तदखिलं धन्यस्तु संन्यस्यति <ls>Bh. 3. 132.</ls>
